trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Milano
There was one other sighting in Milano on or around December 30th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailswas sitting in front yard at dusk, saw a light coming from north going directly overhead, told friend who was sitting with me "look, what's that?" it moved to aproximatly 11:00 on the horizon where it stoped and was met with a similar object coming fron the west and another from the east, the object that came from the east and north stoped and waited while the west object moved into position, it made several adjustments to it's position before forming a triangle with the others, then all three moved off to the east very fast, they also changed color several times, they were mostly a whitish glow, but during the "link up" they did change color from orange to blue and back to white again, when the link up was done to what I consider a perfect triangle the glowed much brighter, (very bright), a bluish white
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
